data.name: Technology Modernization & Application Reengineering Center of Excellence
data.description: Accion's Application Reengineering Center of Excellence specializes in transforming legacy monolithic applications into modern, scalable digital platforms using innovative engineering principles. The CoE provides comprehensive reengineering services including legacy UI to digital experiences transformation, monolithic to microservices migration, infrastructure modernization from servers to containers on cloud, and waterfall to CI/CD automation. Utilizing the proprietary Breeze framework, the CoE enables organizations to achieve faster feature delivery, reduced technical debt, and improved user experiences through systematic application modernization.
keyCompetencies: Legacy UI to Digital Experiences Transformation
Transactional to Big Data Systems Conversion
Infrastructure Modernization (Servers to Containers on Cloud)

data.businessValue: Accion's Application Reengineering CoE delivers transformational business value through reduced time-to-market (from months to weeks for new features), enhanced system performance and scalability, improved user experiences with modern interfaces, and significant cost optimization through cloud-native architectures. The CoE enables organizations to eliminate technical debt, achieve faster deployment cycles, improve system reliability and availability, reduce infrastructure costs by 20-80%, and enhance team productivity through modern development practices and automation.
